summary: Martin Chalfie is a biochemist from the United States.
full_text: Martin Lee Chalfie  is an American scientist. He is University Professor at Columbia University. He shared the 2008 Nobel Prize in Chemistry along with Osamu Shimomura and Roger Y. Tsien "for the discovery and development of the green fluorescent protein, GFP". He holds a Ph.D. in neurobiology from Harvard University.
title: Martin Chalfie
